list.expr: kube_pod_start_time{pod=~"$service.*"} * on (namespace, pod) group_left(label_image_tag, label_chart) kube_pod_labels * 1000
list.name: Pod Started

list.expr: kube_pod_start_time{pod=~"$selector.*"} * on (namespace, pod) group_left(label_image_tag, label_chart) kube_pod_labels * 1000
list.name: Pod Started
